reviewText: A Christmas gift for my father.  He loves this show.
Great season, enjoy watching this reality season.
Love the latest season. Continues to provide great entertainment. The commercial break pauses are the only thing I wish could be changed on the dvds.
I bought this series of Gold Rush for my granddaughter who absolutely loves it.
A great DVD if you like Gold Rush.
Love the show and fast delivery
We always enjoy watching Gold Rush!

Okay, I took some guilty pleasure in watching Todd Hoffman fail in the Amazon.  And who can forget that awesome scene where Todd's goofball father slams a full tree trunk into their diamond machine destroying their whole operation!  LOL!
I can't get enough of this show and have watched each episode at least 3 times. In my opinion best show on tv and would love an opportunity to work with any of those guys and do what they do!
